articles.description: Larian Studios reveals the Baldur’s Gate 3 Mac release date has been pushed back, much to the disappointment of some Mac-using BG3 fans.
articles.content: The Baldur’s Gate 3 Mac release date was originally estimated to arrive on September 6, but that day has been and gone. With Baldur’s Gate 3 arriving on PS5 on Wednesday, one fan on Twitter asked Lar… [+1656 chars]
